delete-node: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
descriptor-tip: Add a README.txt or README.md file to the directory to display its description here.
directory-unloaded: expand this directory in the outline or click on the open button in the toolbar to open its content
empty: When you select an node on the outline, its details will show here.

errors.UNABLE_FETCH_CONTENT: Unable to fetch content from file
errors.UNABLE_POST_CONTENT: Unable to save content to file

continuous-development.description: We are continually working to improve its reliability. Because we can't guarantee complete accuracy, please use it with care and maintain regular backups of your files. Additionally, by using Calystone, you acknowledge our {0} and agree to use the app responsibly.
continuous-development.title: Calystone is an Evolving project

data-ownership.description: Calystone doesn't track or store any data about you or your files. Be aware of the policies for any cloud service you choose. See our {0} to learn more.
data-ownership.title: Flexible Data Ownership

header.description: An open-source self-management app built around your files.
header.title: Welcome to Calystone

note-taking.description: Edit notes quickly using the familiar folder structure you already use.
note-taking.title: Effortless Note-Taking

load-nodes.idle: click to enable the background loading
load-nodes.loading: click to disable the background loading

name: name
not-loaded: Please wait a moment while this node is loaded.

open.title: Access your files using one of the methods below
